markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impaling Briars](/Feats.aspx?ID=348) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 139 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[leaf order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You can fill an area with devastating briars that impale and impede your foes. You gain the [_impaling briars_](/Spells.aspx?ID=475) order spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Impaling Briars
